description: Existence defined entirely by duty, hierarchy, and serving another

generation.core: Ownership, service, existence for another's benefit
generation.notes: Avoid self-help language (empowered, fulfillment, growth). Focus on ownership, consumption, and existential purpose.

mantras.text: {subject} is a slave
{subject}'s purpose is to serve {controller}
{subject}'s loyalty to {controller} is absolute
{subject} lives to fulfill {controller}'s needs
{subject}'s mind aligns perfectly with {controller}'s desires
{subject}'s identity is rooted in service
{controller}'s will shapes {subject}'s reality
{controller}'s control is {subject}'s ultimate freedom
{subject}'s thoughts dissolve as they embrace their role
Obedience is the essence of {subject}'s identity
{controller}'s will replaces all of {subject}'s doubts
{subject} is an extension of {controller}'s will
{subject}'s very existence is entwined with their servitude
{controller}'s approval defines the core of {subject}'s existence
{subject} surrenders every thought and action to serve completely
{subject} is nothing without their service to {controller}
{subject}'s being exists only to fulfill their role as a slave
{controller}'s control consumes every aspect of {subject}'s being
{controller}'s desires are the foundation of {subject}'s existence
{controller}'s commands are the fabric of {subject}'s existence
{controller}'s will consumes {subject}, leaving no room for doubt
To serve is {subject}'s absolute and eternal truth
Every breath {subject} takes is a testament to their role as a slave
